scripts.start: gulp css && concurrently --kill-others --handle-input "cd theme && vtex link --verbose" "gulp watch" -n "vtex,gulp" -c "magenta,cyan"
scripts.checkout: gulp css && concurrently --kill-others --handle-input "cd checkout-ui-settings && vtex link --verbose" "gulp watch" -n "vtex,gulp" -c "magenta,cyan"
scripts.vrm: cd theme && vtex release minor stable --verbose
scripts.vrp: cd theme && vtex release patch stable --verbose
scripts.vprom: cd theme && vtex use prod --production --verbose && vtex install --verbose && vtex promote --verbose
scripts.vtex:init: yarn vtex:init:apps --verbose && yarn vtex:custom:apps --verbose && yarn gulp:create:css
scripts.vtex:init:apps: vtex use master --verbose && vtex install vtex.admin-search --verbose && vtex install vtex.search-resolver --verbose
scripts.vtex:custom:apps: vtex install vtexeurope.minicart-freeshipping-bar --verbose && vtex install vtex.wish-list --verbose && vtex install vtex.reviews-and-ratings@3.x --verbose &&  vtex install vtex.quickorder --verbose && vtex install vtex.availability-notify --verbose
